courses.name: Advanced Machine Learning and Neural Networks
courses.description: This advanced course examines sophisticated machine learning algorithms with emphasis on deep learning architectures and their theoretical foundations. Students explore various neural network types and their mathematical underpinnings while engaging with cutting-edge research.
learning_outcomes: Analyze and implement deep learning architectures
Apply mathematical foundations of neural networks
Design and implement complex ML models using modern frameworks
Assess ethical implications of AI deployment
Conduct independent research in machine learning applications
courses.assessment: Research project 40%, Midterm examination 25%, Assignments 25%, Research paper critique 10%
